case_title: Mst. FARIDA KAUSAR vs MUHAMMAD ASHFAQ

maintenance_suit.title: Mst. Farida Kausar v. Muhammad Ishfaq

golden_ornaments_suit.title: Muhammad Ashfaque v. Mst. Farida and another
golden_ornaments_suit.court: Judge Family Court, Pasrur District Sialkot

petition_details.reason_for_transfer: Feminine convenience and to avoid contradictory judgments

judgment.order: The respondent's suit is transferred from Pasrur District Sialkot to Lahore for adjudication by the court already handling the petitioner's suit.
